document.bingtitle: Why do waiters get mad if you don't tip well or don't tip at all ...
document.webtitle: Why do waiters get mad if you dont tip well or dont tip at all? - Yahoo! Answers
document.description: As a former waitress, who waited tables ... tip for the service provided then go to a fast food restaurant ... but they basically take an order, fill a tray ...
